Just Wanted to say Thanks
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Just Wanted to say Thanks
By Kuwabara54 on Friday, March 30, 2012 - 04:58 am:

I just wanted to say thank you to all of the
support and effort everyone on this site has put
in over the years. I can't even imagine how many
times I have come here with a question in mind and
had it answered within minutes. I started playing
Monster Rancher 2 when I was about 10. I'm 20
years old now and still an avid fan. Without
further ado, I would like to present the product
of so many years of training and support from this
site.

Petey
Scaled Plant (Plant/Zuum)
3rd Generation
Stats:
Lif 999
Pow 472
Int 987
Ski 996
Spd 965
Def 999
Age: 7y 10m
Record: 73W 0L 44KO Forte: Toxic Nectar
Easily defeated Most
Likes: Tab/Me Dislikes: Potato

I was completely stunned that I was able to train
such a monster and I couldn't have done it without
all the help that I received here. I know most of
the original posters won't see this, but thank you
so much for all the hours you spent on this game
to make it a better experience for all of us who
love it.

-Kuwabara

By TheWindupMan on Friday, April 20, 2012 - 12:15 am:

I'd like to say thanks too. I've played MR2 off and on for many years now, and MRM has always been there to provide the most valuable info available. It helps keep the game fun.
